FuncDef: The display vendor-class command displays the configuration of vendor-class.
Examples: Vendor-class(dhcpv4 option60/dhcpv6 option16) has exact match.
Vendor-class(dhcpv4 option60/dhcpv6 option16) has sub-option 10 and sub-offset 2 and sub-length 3 and offset 1.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The display vendor-class command can be used to display output information of the dhcp option-60 and vendor-class commands.
The command output indicates whether the customized options of the vendor contain the domain name, and whether the customized options adopt fuzzy match or exact match.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
